column1: The '''Forest of Region''' was a forest
column2: primarily made up of [[holly]]. Early in the [[First Age]] the [[Tatyar]] rested in its woods.<ref>{{S|Thingol}}</ref>
Region formed the southern and greater part of the Kingdom of [[Doriath]]. It was bounded by the rivers [[Aros]] and [[Esgalduin]] south of [[Dor Dínen]]
column3: and the [[Girdle of Melian]]. [[Menegroth]] lay in that forest.<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

column1: ''Region'' is given as [[Doriathrin]]<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}</ref>. The base is the word ''[[reg]]'' "holly tree"
column2: with perhaps the toponymical ending ''[[-nd|-ion]]'' *"holly-land" or a plural genitive ending ''[[-ion]]'' (as in [[Quenya]])

column1: Note that the name is unrelated to the English word "region (of land)"
column2: and thus is to be pronounced with a hard ''g''.<ref>{{App|Pronunciation}}</ref>
